医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
肺芯片模型为辐射如何损害肺部提供了新的见解肺是人体对辐射最敏感的组织之一。核事故后暴露于高辐射剂量的人会出现放射性肺损伤（RILI），它会影响肺部许多细胞类型的功能，引起急性和持续的炎症，从长远来看，会导致肺组织增厚和结疤称为纤维化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Lung-chip-model-offers-new-insights-into-how-radiation-damages-the-lungs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Lung-chip-model-offers-new-insights-into-how-radiation-damages-the-lungs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f37d4eb7-6089-43b1-840b-8b5d85416954 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 22:11:53 -0400 Lung chip model offers new insights into how radiation damages the lungs
空气污染与女性乳腺癌风险增加有关在细颗粒空气污染程度较高的地区生活和工作的女性比在污染较轻的地区生活和工作的女性更容易患乳腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Air-pollution-linked-to-increased-breast-cancer-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Air-pollution-linked-to-increased-breast-cancer-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5b42811a-9400-4f51-93f5-ffda367c3017 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 21:50:55 -0400 Air pollution linked to increased breast cancer risk in women
虚拟驾驶评估可以预测年轻驾驶员的碰撞风险获得驾照时的虚拟驾驶评估可以预测年轻驾驶员的碰撞风险，从而有可能指导有针对性的干预措施，以提高驾驶技能和安全性。该研究确定了与较高碰撞风险相关的特定技能群，提供了一种数据驱动的方法来减少新驾驶员的事故。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Virtual-driven-assessments-could-forecast-crash-risk-in-young-drivers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Virtual-driven-assessments-could-forecast-crash-risk-in-young-drivers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cebc9f63-5314-4ba4-9069-62b2cfcc21a8 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 21:50:00 -0400 Virtual driving assessments could forecast crash risk in young drivers
肾移植逆转肾脏衰老《内科杂志》上的这项最新研究表明，肾移植可以减轻慢性肾病患者肾脏衰老的影响，效果优于透析。该研究利用 DNA 甲基化时钟来评估生物年龄，发现年龄加速在移植后一年有所下降，但在透析后保持不变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Kidney-transplantation-turns-back-the-clock-on-renal-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Kidney-transplantation-turns-back-the-clock-on-renal-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ac65a5a8-0b1b-4cce-9089-e249daa69772 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 21:39:00 -0400 Kidney transplantation turns back the clock on renal aging
新的治疗方案为非小细胞肺癌患者带来希望最新报告中首次报告了多项具有里程碑意义的临床试验结果，更多非小细胞肺癌 (NSCLC) 患者可能会受益于针对肿瘤细胞分子改变的新药，而无需化疗2023 年 ESMO 大会 (1-7)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/New-treatment-options-offer-hope-for-病人-with-non-small-cell-lung-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/New-treatment-options-offer-hope-for-病人-with-non-small-cell-lung-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=13dad0fe-0fbd-4576-8779-b8becaa89457 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 21:33:01 -0400 New treatment options offer hope for patients with non-small cell lung cancer
不利的工作条件如何增加抑郁的风险《柳叶刀》的这项研究揭示了不利的工作条件与抑郁症等心理健康疾病的发生之间存在很强的相关性，强调了工作场所干预的必要性。它呼吁改进理论框架和评估方法，以进一步了解这种联系并将研究结果转化为可行的政策。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/How-adverse-working-conditions-increase-the-risk-of-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/How-adverse-working-conditions-increase-the-risk-of-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4625b79-c74a-44e3-b83a-12711c61f335 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 21:29:00 -0400 How adverse working conditions increase the risk of depression
最新研究可能会改变妇科癌症女性的治疗前景备受期待的妇科癌症 3 期临床试验结果以及涵盖宫颈癌患者治疗整个范围的新数据等，将于 2023 年西班牙马德里举行的 ESMO 大会上公布。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Late-writing-studies-could-change-the-treatment-landscape-for-women-with-gynecological-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Late-writing-studies-could-change-the-treatment-landscape-for-women-with-gynecological-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f74bc69-1062-4958-a837-da86ea3c0ee6 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 21:20:47 -0400 Late-breaking studies could change the treatment landscape for women with gynecological cancers
调查揭示的识别微妙乳腺癌症状的知识差距俄亥俄州立大学综合癌症中心 - Arthur G. James 癌症医院和 Richard J. Solove 研究所 (OSUCCC – James) 进行的一项调查的最新结果揭示了公众理解中的关键差距，强调了加强教育和治疗的紧迫性。意识。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Knowledge-gaps-in-identifying-subtle-breast-cancer-symptoms-expose-by-survey.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Knowledge-gaps-in-identifying-subtle-breast-cancer-symptoms-expose-by-survey.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd49252e-9a76-4887-8cff-717470a3dbe0 Tue, 17 Oct 2023 21:17:00 -0400 Knowledge gaps in identifying subtle breast cancer symptoms exposed by survey
口服糖尿病和肥胖症药物 danuglipron 和 orforglipron 有前景，但存在胃肠道缺陷根据一项系统评价，新型口服 GLP-1 受体激动剂 danuglipron 和 orforglipron 在治疗 2 型糖尿病和肥胖症方面显示出前景。虽然这些药物可有效控制血糖和减轻体重，但会产生胃肠道副作用，可能导致治疗停止。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Oral-diabetes-and-obesity-meds-danuglipron-and-orforglipron-show-promise-but-have-胃肠道-drawbacks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Oral-diabetes-and-obesity-meds-danuglipron-and-orforglipron-show-promise-but-have-胃肠道-drawbacks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=66940737-5ec5-4128-ba23-c6829273a66a Tue, 17 Oct 2023 21:05:00 -0400 Oral diabetes and obesity meds danuglipron and orforglipron show promise but have gastrointestinal drawbacks
减肥药需求飙升促使人们呼吁知情处方该研究表明，从 2014 年到 2022 年，美国用于体重管理和 2 型糖尿病的 GLP-1 受体激动剂（尤其是 Ozempic 和 Trulicity）的使用显着增加。在快速增长和短缺的情况下，该论文呼吁基于证据的决策确保药品供应稳定、治疗有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Skyrocketing-demand-for-weight-loss-drugs-prompts-calls-for-informed-prescribing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231017/Skyrocketing-demand-for-weight-loss-drugs-prompts-calls-for-informed-prescribing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f8b7aace-7a1c-4384-8740-a20de75ecdcb Tue, 17 Oct 2023 20:43:00 -0400 Skyrocketing demand for weight-loss drugs prompts calls for informed prescribing
